name: RIPS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: RIPS - A static source code analyser for vulnerabilities in PHP scripts

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div class="logo"><a id="logo" href="http:\/\/sourceforge\.net\/projects\/rips-scanner\/files\/" target="_blank" title="get latest version">([^<^\s]+)<\/a><\/div>)

matches.text: subdirs
